title: Can't identify this script
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152725im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hh_5161.jpg)

Anyone got a clue?  
From what I can tell its a customized keunstler script

 [‹ (x) Looking for graffiti fonts - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152725/http:/www.typophile.com/node/9065 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID this font please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152725/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27892 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid

comments.content:
The H’s look more like they were customized from [Boulevard](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152725/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/boulevard-be/), but the lower case is not Boulevard at all, or Kuenstler either, with that ’r’. The lower case could be borrowed from a number of scripts, like [Citadel](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152725/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atcitadel-script/), or [Classic script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152725/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/classic-script/).

- Mike Yanega

You got it Lex. It was about two pages back from where I stopped turning the pages.

- Mike Yanega

Yeah, it was right on the [first page](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152725/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script01Pg1.html) of your guide.

- Lex

Hmmm. How embarrassing! But I’m glad it helped you.

- Mike Yanega
